content.raw: The `SemanticVersion` class was [added in ignition-math2 version 2.6.0](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/annotate/acedf1754a1282b890ec97d1d88bb534de93e9fb/Changelog.md?at=ignition-math2_2.9.0&fileviewer=file-view-default#Changelog.md-31:53), while the [system version is 2.2.3](https://packages.ubuntu.com/xenial/libignition-math2-dev). I'm guessing you got a newer version of sdformat from packages.osrfoundation.org but need to upgrade the `libignition-math*`. When you output what @sloretz recommended, we can see if this is the case.
content.html: The SemanticVersion class was added in ignition-math2 version 2.6.0, while the system version is 2.2.3. I'm guessing you got a newer version of sdformat from packages.osrfoundation.org but need to upgrade the libignition-math*. When you output what @sloretz recommended, we can see if this is the case.
